review.comment: The best facility I have ever seen top notch services I delivered my daughter there 2years ago since then I have recommended 2moms and their feedback is superb. Big up and do more expansions

review.comment: My all time best Maternity,i delivered my 2nd born there including anc,my 3rd ante-natal clinic was fantastic though nhif couldn't cover labour bill so i went for delivery else where,,,and now on my 4th journey and hopefully my Last maternal experience soo ill be seeing you next week for my 1st antenatal clinic.See you soon Jacaranda fraternity.❤
review.review_reply: We can't wait to have you back Purity! We love having you over, and look forward to providing you with competent and friendly care.

review.comment: Nice place to be but I challenge them on the food given to lactating mother's it's not enough mothers starve in there am about to deliver my twins but l have second thought of delivery there because I think am going to starve if you would only improve on food then u could be a five star ⭐ hospital
review.review_reply: Thanks Benson for the feedback.

review.comment: First time mom (DRAMATIC); Loved the maternity team, Beth and Serah were really helpful and friendly plus others I didn't catch their names. Very clean, good food. All the docs were pretty good. Wait times have gotten shorter for clinics. Hope it gets even better.
review.review_reply: Welcome to motherhood! Thank you for the feedback. Glad you had a good experience with us. Looking forward to walking with you through the postnatal journey as well.

review.comment:
Your imagery staff require good customer care training,

we've been here since 12pm, right now it's almost 3pm, we've not been helped despite the doctor's intervention but still no explanation and the radiologist staff is rude...

the staff here is undermotivated and dull, so consider other hospitals esp on weekends
review.review_reply: Sincere apologies Dennis. We're working on making sure there are no wait times, regardless wether we have an event. Thank you for the feedback. We're following up right away.

review.comment: I gave birth in this hospital in 2016 in looking forward to going back during my next delivery. Everything was top notch
review.review_reply: We strive to always give you the best. Thank you for the feedback and glad you have good memories of Jacaranda Maternity. Karibu tena Cynthia!

review.comment: Wonderful

review.comment: Great hospital. Friendly staff. A bit expensive but good value for money.

review.comment: I was there last month for delivery and what I went through I wouldn't wish my enemy to go through, after Cs I developed severe complication and you people never bothered ,pls check your theatre team something is wrong with your theatre!!!!I don't want to expose you  but be very careful what you are doing to patients!!

review.review_reply: We are so glad that you had a great experience Godfrey. We are grateful for you, and congratulations to you and your wife on your bundle of joy!

review.comment: I delivered my baby there 2 months ago the services were very good from admission to giving birth. Being a new mum i was scared but the nurses were very kind and reassuring and they helped me during the long hours of labour. Only one concern when i was being discharged nobody assisted me with carrying my baby or guiding us on the way to clear out which left us stranded for over 2hours. Kindly work on your discharge process it takes too long. Otherwise it's a good maternity hospital
review.review_reply: Thank you Eunice for the feedback. Glad you enjoyed our services. Happy Holidays

review.comment: At your own risk.....too many cases of misdiagnosis. Someone is not doing their work well. The ultrasound guy needs to be reviewed.

review.comment: I been  here for over 1 hour with a sick child not a single doctor to attend to the child

review.comment:
The nurses are unprofessional and lack the essense of maternal care; emphasis on CARE.
I say this because, when being admitted there was a lady clearly struggling with labour, she was quite loud. On inquiring what was going on, the nurse laughed and said " wachana na huyo anajifanya, ni mwenda wazimu".
Its mean spirited and unprofessional for maternal care providers to ridicule a patient even if that patient is deemed 'uncooperative'. Labour is a scary experience, instead of ridicule and leaving the patient to her own devices, the nurses ought to have offered support and tried to bring calm to the patient.
This is the essense of CARE. DO BETTER!!!!
review.review_reply:
Hello Mercy,
Congratulations on your bundle of joy!, and thank you for your feedback. For follow up kindly share your contact details to customercare@jacarandamaternity.co.ke. We value your feedback.

Hello Swaz,
Thank you for choosing Jacaranda Maternity. Kindly share your contact details to customercare@jacarandamaternity.co.ke for follow up. We value your feedback

review.comment: I was a first time patient and won't lie right from the reception to the service providers,it was top-notch..They are very kind and hospitable...I'm definitely coming back again
review.review_reply: That's wonderful news Cynthia! We look forward to having you back soon!

review.comment: I have been attending my ANC here and i love the services. Its a clean hospital with very professional staff. However, am not very okay delivering here because they lack NICU and as much as we hope for the best you may not know if an emergency will occur.
review.review_reply: Hi Josphine, thanks so much for your review and feedback. We are so sorry you won't be delivering with us, but will take your view into consideration to make our hospital better over time. Best wishes for your delivery, and congratulations in advance!

review.comment: I love the medical/nursing team but the security officers need training on customer service. They're soooo annoying!!!

review.comment: Extremely professional staff. They offer great services to mothers and young children. Location is great, next to the road. Currently undergoing expansion to create more rooms. #Letsguide

review.comment: Best service ever,my all time maternity hospital
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your review! We appreciate it a lot!

review.comment: Wow.. this is a great NHIF accredited facility easily accessible along Kamiti Rd next to Kiambumbi Police Station. I had a great experience at the front office desk and a family member antenatal clinic first visit. I must thank a great  customer service officer Kennedy Macharia and a committed nurse Mercy Kuria and all others. You guys are awesome and you made us feel at home. Blessing 🙏🏾
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your review! We really appreciate it!

review.comment: Someone told me that you guys rush to do a CS so that you can earn more money.... I rather u charge me extra but sio mkimbilie kukaa mtu tumbo
review.review_reply:
Hi Albert. Thanks for your concern. We take very important clinical measures to ensure that a patient has a normal delivery rather than a CS. Nobody here wants a CS to earn extra money, and we try and prevent this as much as possible by encouraging patients to start their prenatal journey with us as early as possible. We can then assess patients and start them off in the right manner so that a CS is avoided as much as possible. Of course, that does not guarantee that a CS won't happen due to complications in the labour stage, to ensure that mother and baby are safe. But chances are much lower than if a patient comes in just for delivery without us having any records of her medical and maternity journey (eg - does the patient have a history of high blood pressure, previous CS, how has her pregnancy progressed to date etc).
Patients are encouraged to start their pregnancy journey as soon as possible in order to have a well-managed pregnancy, with the hopes of a normal delivery at the end, and a healthy mum and baby. This is what motivates us, not the money!
Thanks so much for your review Loise! We appreciate you!
Thanks so much for your review Prudence!
Thanks for your review James!

review.comment: Quality service
review.review_reply: Thank you for your feedback Edwin!
Thanks so much for your review Faith!

review.comment: All was well before delivery but during delivery I don't know what went wrong. My baby developed Erb's palsy on the right hand, every week I have to go for physiotherapy with the hope all will be well. For the last two weeks  I have been carrying this burden and I had to let it out to be able to forgive. My advice to the nurses, let the baby take their time to come into the world you don't have to pull a baby and cause avoidable damage to the infant especially if there is  no complication, hurry hurry has no blessings.
Best customer service ever been attending my clinics here and I love it ,highly recommend
review.review_reply: Thanks so much for your kind feedback Mary! We really appreciate it, and please do let your friends and family know about us!

review.comment: I had my first born delivered there,you have good services, good nurses, affordable prices but it was unfortunate there was some med my son was to get injected 12hours after delivery but only to be told it's not in the hospital after he was delivered, seriously  and  I'm the one supposed to buy it and I had no clue or information on where it's supposed to be found because it could not be found on all chemist wholesalers in town.
review.review_reply: So sorry about your experience Edgar, we will investigate this further

review.comment: Gave birth here and i would recommend it. Very friendly staff and very patient too

Very clean.

review.comment: The place is well organized, the staff are polite and their charges are reasonable. I had my firstborn delivered there and we had the best experience . Their dedication to providing quality maternal care is remarkable. Keep it up!

EXCELLENT.

review.comment: Best experience ever had

review.comment: It was a home away from home. The obs/gyn Dr Nduhiu,paediatrician -Dr Mureithi   and nurses are the best. I will definitely come back. Hospitality is superb. Nurses, Phylis, Christine, Maureen, Maria and Jane just to list a few. I will forever be grateful!

review.comment: Very poor service, you can spend at least half a day waiting, no gyno availible when they indicate they have a gyno availible. Stil expensive for what you get.
review.review_reply: Hi Sarah, so sorry for your unfortunately experience, please email us on info@jacarandahealth.org with when you came to visit us (date and time) and we will investigate the matter. Please leave us your number so we can call you and follow up. So sorry once again.

review.comment: Jacaranda Maternity offers the very best and high-quality maternal and pediatric care. I have experienced their services and I can guarantee you will be taken care of by the awesome staff. They listen, respect, and dare to care for their clients. Do not look for big names out there while looking for a place to bring your new addition into this world. Just visit Jacaranda Maternity and its very affordable. NHIF accepted

As a first time mom Jacaranda Maternity took care of me since my antenatal days till the day I delivered my son. They have quality and affordable maternal health care. Would highly recommend this hospital to parents within Nairobi.
review.review_reply: Thanks for your review Nyokabi! We appreciate it
